greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Signed recurrence over enriched r-trees: a(n) = 2 * (-1)^n + Sum_y Product_{i in y} a(y) where the sum is over all integer partitions of n - 1.
formula: a(n) = Sum_t 2^k * (-1)^w where the sum is over all enriched r-trees of size n, k is the number of leaves, and w is the sum of leaves.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Mar 21 2018
